import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`USER AUTHENTICATION WITH EXPRESS AND MONGO`}</MDXTag>

`}</MDXTag></MDXTag><MDXTag name="ol" components={components} parentName="li">

</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Setting up credentials to do what you say you want to do`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Authentication vs Authorization`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Authentication: Confirming the user is who they say they are
Authorization: Where you are and aren't allow to see certain information`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Steps:`}</MDXTag>

</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Sessions can be used for a db to have "unique token" which sticks with you and your device until the end of the session.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`//////////////`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The project uses Express and MongoDB`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`/`}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong">{`****`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>

        } else {

} else {

<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`router.post('/login', function(req, res, next) {
if (req.body.email && req.body.password) {
User.authenticate(req.body.email, req.body.password, function (error, user) {
if (error || !user) {
var err = new Error('Wrong email or password.');
err.status = 401;
return next(err);
} else {
req.session.userId = user._id;
return res.redirect('/profile');
}
});
} else {
var err = new Error('Email and password are required.');
err.status = 401;
return next(err);
}
});`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`// in user.js`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`UserSchema.statics.authenticate = function(email, password, callback) {
User.findOne({ email: email })
.exec(function (error, user) {
if (error) {
return callback(error);
} else if (!user) {
var err = new Error('User not found.');
err.status = 401;
return callback(err);
}
bcrypt.compare(password, user.password, function (error, result) {
if (result === true) {
return callback(null, user);
} else {
return callback();
}
});
});
}`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`// GET /profile`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`router.get('/profile', function(req, res, next) {
if (! req.session.userId ) {
var err = new Error("You are not authorized to view this page.");
err.status = 403;
return next(err);
}
User.findById(req.session.userId)
.exec(function (error, user) {
if (error) {
return next(error);
} else {
return res.render('profile', { title: 'Profile', name: user.name, favorite: user.favoriteBook });
}
});
});`}</MDXTag>
